Trigger.Note: If you are playing on the arcade machine go West. If you are using the keyboard, go South. If you are using an XBOX controller, go East. Thank You.
Remember fire spreads. But as long as you are in your fire form you will be safe.
You may be able to shoot over water and some types of plants.
Pressing '2' on the numpad does a melee attack. You can also start up a conversation using it.
When you are in your ice form you can walk on the ice, however any other form will slide. Non-ice based enemies will slide as well.
Remember that fire won't hurt you while you are in your fire form. In any other form you should avoid fire.
Congratulations you have no been trained in all the artifacts
Pressing 'X' will do a melee slash. You can also press 'X' to start a conversation.
Congratulations you have no been trained in all the artifacts
Pressing '1' does a melee attack. You can also start up a conversation using it.
Remember fire spreads. But as long as you are in your fire form you will be safe.
You may be able to shoot over water and some types of plants.
Remember that fire won't hurt you while you are in your fire form. In any other form you should avoid fire.
When you are in your ice form you can walk on the ice, however any other form will slide. Non-ice based enemies will slide as well.
Congratulations you have no been trained in all the artifacts
Sometimes enemies will drop items such as potions. When you have a potion, press '2' to use it.
Sometimes enemies will drop items such as potions. When you have a potion, press '3' to use it.
Sometimes enemies will drop items such as potions. When you have a potion, press 'Right Bumper' to use it.
Remember fire spreads. But as long as you are in your fire form you will be safe.
You may be able to shoot over water and some types of plants.
Remember that fire won't hurt you while you are in your fire form. In any other form you should avoid fire.
When you are in your ice form you can walk on the ice, however any other form will slide. Non-ice based enemies will slide as well.

Entity.Name: Bob
Entity.Text: The Fire artifact is extremely useful. You should press '4' on the numpad to shoot a fireball.

Entity.Name: Bob
Entity.Text: You can press '5' on the numpad to shoot a Chakram. These are like fireballs, but can bounce off of objects.

Entity.Name: Bob
Entity.Text: Your last fire ability is a dash attack. To perform this attack press '6' on the numpad.

Entity.Name: Bob
Entity.Text: Here is the Ice Artifact. You can press '7' and '8' to cycle through your artifacts. When you are in your ice form, press '4' on the numpad to shoot an icicle.

Entity.Name: Bob
Entity.Text: You can press '5' to perform an ice sword attack. You can also press '6' to freeze the ground in front of you and heal yourself.

Entity.Name: Bob
Entity.Text: The Earth Artifact is awesome! You can press '4' to throw a rock! Oh yeah, and you can press '5' to smash boulders. Pressing '6' will temporarily give you an earthen shield.

Entity.Name: Bob
Entity.Text: The final artifact is Lightning. You can press '4' to shoot electricity. Pressing '5' will do an electric sword swipe. Pressing '6' will do an electric dash.

Entity.Name: Bob
Entity.Text: The Fire artifact is extremely useful. You should press 'A' to shoot a fireball.

Entity.Name: Bob
Entity.Text: You can press 'B' to shoot a chakram. These are like fireballs, but can bounce off of objects.

Entity.Name: Bob
Entity.Text: You can press 'Y' to perform a fire dash attack.

Entity.Name: Bob
Entity.Text: Here is the Ice Artifact. You can press LT and RT to cycle through the artifacts. When you are in your ice form, press 'A' to shoot an icicle.

Entity.Name: Bob
Entity.Text: You can press 'B' to perform an Ice Sword attack. Pressing 'Y' will freeze the ground below you and heal you.

Entity.Name: Bob
Entity.Text: The Earth Artifact is awesome! You can press 'A' to throw a rock! Oh yeah, and you can press 'B' to smash these boulders. Pressing 'Y' will temporarily give you an Earthen shield.

Entity.Name: Bob
Entity.Text: The Lightning artifact is the last one. Press 'A' to shoot a lightning bolt. Press 'B' to do an electric sword slash. Press 'Y' to do an electric dash attack.

Entity.Name: Bob
Entity.Text: The Fire artifact is extremely useful. You should press '3' to shoot a fireball.

Entity.Name: Bob
Entity.Text: You can press '4' to shoot a Chakram. These are like fireballs, but can bounce off of objects.

Entity.Name: Bob
Entity.Text: Your last fire ability is a dash attack. To perform this attack press '5'.

Entity.Name: Bob
Entity.Text: Here is the Ice Artifact. You can press 'Left Click' and 'Right Click' to cycle through your artifacts. When you are in your ice form, press '3' to shoot an icicle.

Entity.Name: Bob
Entity.Text: You can press '4' to perform an ice sword attack. You can also press '5' to freeze the ground in front of you and heal yourself.

Entity.Name: Bob
Entity.Text: The Earth Artifact is awesome! You can press '3' to throw a rock! Oh yeah, and you can press '4' to smash boulders. Pressing '5' will temporarily give you an earthen shield.

Entity.Name: Bob
Entity.Text: The final artifact is Lightning. You can press '3' to shoot electricity. Pressing '4' will do an electric sword swipe. Pressing '5' will do an electric dash.

Entity.Name: Bob
Entity.Text: You can practice with the FIRE ARTIFACT here.

Entity.Name: Bob
Entity.Text: You can practice with the ICE ARTIFACT here.

Entity.Name: Bob
Entity.Text: You can practice with the EARTH ARTIFACT here.

Entity.Name: Bob
Entity.Text: You can practice with the LIGHTNING ARTIFACT here.

Entity.Name: Bob
Entity.Text: Press '4' on the numpad to shoot a FIREBALL. Press '5' to shoot a FIRE CHAKRAM, that bounces. Press '6' to do a FIRE DASH.

Entity.Name: Bob
Entity.Text: Press '4' on the numpad to shoot an ICICLE. Press '5' to do an ICE SWORD attack. Press '6' to Freeze the ground below you and to HEAL yourself.

Entity.Name: Bob
Entity.Text: Press '4' on the numpad to THROW A ROCK. Press '5' to SMASH boulders. Press '6' to create an earthen SHIELD.

Entity.Name: Bob
Entity.Text: Press '4' on the numpad to shoot LIGHTNING. Press '5' to do an electric SWORD SLASH. Press '6' to perform and electric DASH.

Entity.Name: Mom
Entity.Text: Good Morning Tessara, you're wearing your horns today? Oh that's right, today is the big day isn't it? When you are ready, go speak to the Elders in their Sanctuary in the north part of town. I Love You.

Entity.Name: Jim
Entity.Text: Some dark magic has overgrown the entrance to the cursed forest. It would take powerful magic to burn a path through.

Entity.Name: Bob
Entity.Text: A massive rockslide has cut us off from Mt. Baldur! It's going to take months of hammering to clear a way!

Entity.Name: Vanessa
Entity.Text: Ever since the flood we've had no news of the villagers who settled on the snowy plains! How are we going to get past all this water?

Entity.Name: Jorge
Entity.Text: It is time for your test of manhood. There has been much evil coming forth from lands surrounding ours.

Entity.Name: Daniel
Entity.Text: Therefore your task is to rid the neighboring lands of this evil that afflicts us all.

Entity.Name: Mark
Entity.Text: But you will not be on your own. On your path you will find Artifacts that will grant you powers of ancient heros.

Entity.Name: Evan
Entity.Text: We shall grant you your first Artifact. The rest must be earned by defeating the leaders of the evil monsters. To begin, you should go to the practice room on the east side of town. Then go to the cursed forest. Good Luck.

Entity.Name: Bob
Entity.Text: Welcome to the shop, If you'd like to trade go talk to the magic bread on that table.

Entity.Name: Witch
Entity.Text: I sense great power in you child. Take this key and slay the beast who disturbs the spirit of the forest.

Entity.Name: Bob
Entity.Text: Oh, thank you for rescuing me. I have been locked in here since I was a child and I am really bored.

Entity.Name: Vanessa
Entity.Text: Do you like my summer home?
